sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Comments from './Comments'; import Rating from './Ratings'; // Array of recipes const recipes = [ { id: 1, title: "Chicken Tikka Masala", ingredients: [ "500g chicken breast", "200g yogurt", "2 tbsp lemon juice", "2 tsp ground cumin", "2 tsp ground coriander", "1 tsp turmeric", "1 tsp paprika", "1 tsp garam masala", "3 tbsp vegetable oil", "1 large onion", "3 cloves garlic", "1 tbsp ginger, grated", "400g can tomatoes", "200ml coconut milk", "Fresh coriander leaves" ], instructions: [ "Marinate the chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, and spices.", "Fry the onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.", "Add the marinated chicken and cook until done.", "Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk.", "Simmer until the sauce thickens.", "Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan." ], ratings: [] }, { id: 2, title: "Palak Paneer", ingredients: [ "250g paneer", "500g spinach", "2 tbsp oil", "1 large onion", "2 cloves garlic", "1 inch ginger", "2 green chilies", "2 tomatoes", "1 tsp cumin seeds", "1 tsp garam masala", "1/2 tsp turmeric", "1/2 tsp red chili powder", "Salt to taste", "2 tbsp cream" ], instructions: [ "Blanch the spinach and blend it into a smooth puree.", "Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.", "Add chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and green chilies and sauté until golden brown.", "Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.", "Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt.", "Add the spinach puree and cook for a few minutes.", "Add cubed paneer and simmer for 5-7 minutes.", "Stir in cream and serve hot with naan or rice." ], ratings: [] }, { id: 3, title: "Butter Chicken", ingredients: [ "500g chicken breast", "200g yogurt", "2 tbsp lemon juice", "1 tsp turmeric", "2 tsp garam masala", "1 tsp ground cumin", "1 tsp paprika", "3 tbsp butter", "1 large onion", "2 cloves garlic", "1 inch ginger", "400g can tomatoes", "200ml cream", "Salt to taste", "Fresh coriander leaves" ], instructions: [ "Marinate the chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, turmeric, and spices.", "Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.", "Add the marinated chicken and cook until done.", "Stir in tomatoes and cook until the oil separates.", "Add cream and simmer for a few minutes.", "Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan." ], ratings: [] }, { id: 4, title: "Aloo Gobi", ingredients: [ "2 medium potatoes", "1 medium cauliflower", "2 tbsp oil", "1 large onion", "2 cloves garlic", "1 inch ginger", "2 green chilies", "2 tomatoes", "1 tsp cumin seeds", "1 tsp turmeric", "1 tsp ground coriander", "1/2 tsp garam masala", "Salt to taste", "Fresh coriander leaves" ], instructions: [ "Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.", "Add chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and green chilies and sauté until golden brown.", "Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.", "Add turmeric, ground coriander, garam masala, and salt.", "Add cubed potatoes and cauliflower florets.", "Cook until the vegetables are tender.", "Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with chapati or rice." ], ratings: [] }, { id: 5, title: "Paneer Butter Masala", ingredients: [ "250g paneer", "2 tbsp butter", "2 onions", "2 tomatoes", "1 tsp ginger-garlic paste", "1/2 tsp turmeric powder", "1 tsp red chili powder", "1/2 tsp garam masala", "200ml fresh cream", "Salt to taste", "Fresh coriander leaves", "2 tbsp oil", "1 cup water" ], instructions: [ "Cut paneer into cubes and fry lightly in oil.", "In another pan, heat butter and sauté onions until golden.", "Add ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, and garam masala.", "Add tomatoes and cook until the oil separates.", "Add water and bring to a boil, then add paneer and simmer.", "Stir in cream and cook for a few more minutes.", "Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with naan or rice." ], ratings: [] } ]; const RecipeDetails = ({ recipe }) => (

{recipe.title}

Ingredients: {recipe.ingredients.join(', ')}

Instructions: {recipe.instructions.join(' ')}

); const App = () => { return (
{recipes.map((recipe) => ( ))}
); }; export default App;
